name: Lia - Dungeon adventures
description:
Lia: dangeons runner - Arcade game about the little princess Lia, who must save the enchanted and captured fairies. Lia will have to roam the dark dungeons, pass through the intricate way of the old castle and fight with monsters.

Game features:

  • 9 challenging levels
  • Save the magical fairies
  • Collect magic balls
  • Perform a variety of tasks
  • The game has original soundtrack
